category: news
title: "OnePulse creates AI tool"
excerpt: "The AI-driven platform, part of the OnePulse platform, will help build surveys and deliver reports for users, and includes a survey translator tool to help target international audiences in their native languages. Conversational AI will also be used to help clients ask higher quality questions and scale research capabilities."
